titles.title: A bill for the relief of Fatuka Kaikumba Flake.
A bill for the relief of Fatuka Kaikumba Flake.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Fatuka Kaikumba Flake to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
